anyone_with_access_to_the_current_authen: Anyone with access to the current authentication code can also file online for this company.

people_digital_authorisation_ending_para: You can do this by selecting ‘restore authorisation’, or people can restore themselves (if they have the current authentication code). You can also remove people.
people_digital_authorisation_paragraph: Anyone who has a ‘not authorised’ status, and still needs to be digitally authorised for this company, will need to have their authorisation restored.
